topic.title: Show or Hide Images Dialog Box

para.text: Show or Hide Images Dialog Box
dialog box provides a quick way to show or hide the images that have been imported. It can only be displayed if more than one image has been imported into ModelMuse. It is displayed by selecting
Each image is listed next to a checkbox. If the checkbox next to an image is checked, the image will be visible; otherwise, the image will be hidden. Clicking the
buttons will show or hide all of the images. Clicking the
button will show all the images that are hidden and hide all those that are visible.

The order in which the images are displayed can be changed by clicking in the column to the left of the image name and dragging it to a new position in the list. The images are listed in order from back to front.
If only a single image has been imported into ModelMuse, selecting
will show the image if it is hidden and hide it if it is visible.
